charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had just finished a
Pokémon battle against Dahlia...
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_0200: Great battle! You were so very, very good!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_0300:
Though I did notice you looked a bit tense...which
was not so good!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0401_0500:
I’m happy you think so, but don’t forget to have
fun, even when your opponent is strong!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0402_0700:
It’s good you feel that way! After all, who
doesn’t want to win?
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_0800: Always be smiling! That’s the key to success!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_0900:
That’s true for more than just battling, too—as
long as you smile, luck will come your way!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_1100:
She’s always dancing and having fun, no matter
what happens.
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_1200: Win or lose, she’s all smiles!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_1300: And when we dance together? Same story!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_1400: No need to worry. ♪ I’m so lucky to have met her!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0401_1600:
Yup! Meeting a partner Pokémon you click well
with is just great!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0402_1800: Right? And that’s the best way to be!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_1900:
When Ludicolo hears cheerful music, she begins
dancing in rhythm to amplify her power.
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2000: So I’m gonna amplify mine by smiling!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2100:
Both Ludicolo and I are cheerful and bursting with
energy. We don’t need to worry. ♪
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2200: Dancing’s only made our bond grow stronger!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2300:
When we dance together, our breathing syncs
and our hearts beat as one.
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2400:
Now I can tell what Ludicolo wants by the way
she moves her body!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_2500:
That’s why we haven’t lost much since we
became a sync pair here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0301_2600: So good luck came your way, huh?
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0401_2700:
Yup! That’s why we need to be high-spirited
and full of energy!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_0302_2800: All because you kept on smiling?
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_3000:
Smiles have the power to cast out bad luck and
draw in good luck!
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_3100:
Plus, if you battle someone with a great smile—
regardless whether you win or lose—you can’t
help but smile yourself, right?
charaepi_ch0202_00_dahlia/2301_1201_3200:
I want you to become a wonderful Trainer
who can influence others just like that!
